feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Resilient revert by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16499
  • Fix selectedScreen store infinite loop by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16544
  • Convert integration config files to ts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16518
  • Fix MSSQL config validation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16517

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.11...3.13.12

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix de-selecting multi-select defaulted values by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16481
  • Small fix: for REST textarea for raw and jsonpreview by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16547
  • Another date parsing fix. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16548
  • More quota tracing and validation tracing. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16545

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.12...3.13.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Links not working by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16550

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.13...3.13.14

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Centre align login header whenever the text wraps by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16552
  • Revert cell highlight colors by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16553

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.14...3.13.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.13.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Fixing addition of new columns when some are hidden" by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16562

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.13.15...3.13.16
